alert.note: Alert for Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 10:57PM CDT until March 25 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Kiamichi River near Antlers affecting Pushmataha County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kiamichi River near Antlers. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, minor flooding begins along the west bank of the Kiamichi River near Moyers. Campers along the river should move to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 24.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 25.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
